gdtuber.title: GDTuber
description: A dynamic and open source PNGTuber software.
Developed by 11 contributors using the Godot engine.

smart-thermostat.title: Smart Thermostat
description: A smart thermostat run by a Raspberry Pi with ESP32 microcontrollers as wireless temperature sensors.
Remotely monitorable and controllable via a web interface.
Code structure and logic developed with Python and FastAPI.

daycart-isle.title: Daycart Isle
description: A small island to explore using the ability to arbitrarily scale any pickupable object.
Created over 72 hours in a team of 2 for GMTK Game Jam.

to-the-lake.title: To The Lake
description: A small 2D RPG game created in Godot Engine.
Developed over 8 days in a team of 2 for Godot Wild Jam #70.
All art created from scratch during the event.

java-tower-defense.title: Tower Defense Game
description: A basic tower defense game writen from scratch using the LibGDX graphics library in Java.

ncurses-game.title: Enemy Avoider Game
description: A basic enemy avoider game in the command line developed using Ncurses with C++.
Created over 24 hours for the HackCU 2019 hackathon in order to learn the challenges and conepts important to designing a game engine.
